Package facades

Class BrowsrController

java.lang.Object
facades.BrowsrController
All Implemented Interfaces:
AddBookmarkListener, EventListener, FormListener, HyperLinkListener, ReloadListener, SavePageListener, SearchBarListener
public class BrowsrController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReloadListener, SearchBarListener, HyperLinkListener, FormListener, AddBookmarkListener, SavePageListener
Controller type class. Used to receive Events and handle them.

    • runUrl

      public void runUrl​(java.lang.String path)
      Used to process an URL. Reads in the HTML code from the given URL, converts it to GUIElements and updates the displayed URL in the searchbar. It then transmits the GUIElements to the windowManager to load it.
      Specified by:
      runUrl in interface HyperLinkListener
      Specified by:
      runUrl in interface SearchBarListener
      Parameters:
      path - - the URL to process.

    • loadHTML

      public void loadHTML​(HTMLDocument HTMLDocument, java.lang.String url, java.lang.String htmlString)
      Converts the given HTML code to GUIElements, and then loads them to the given HTMLDocument.
      Specified by:
      loadHTML in interface ReloadListener
      Parameters:
      HTMLDocument - - the HTMLDocument in which the GUIElements have to be loaded.
      url - - the URL to transmit to the given HTMLDocument.
      htmlString - - HTML code to transform to GUIElements.
